medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Sudden onset of diffuse abdominal pain radiating to the back. The pain has been constant but improving gradually overnight, with no alleviating or exacerbating factors.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Coronary artery disease status post myocardial infarctions x 2, status post percutaneous coronary intervention with stent placement. 2. Hypertension. 3. Elevated cholesterol. 4. Osteopetrosis imperfecta.
